EmailTemplate.name: May Digest 2017.Spring Email send 5-3-17
EmailTemplate.subject: 5/30 Webinar: Continuous Deployment to the Cloud with Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May 3, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]>
Continuous Deployment with Spring Cloud Marcin Grzejszczak, Pivotal may 30, 2017 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Donâ€™t start from zero with your deployment pipelines! Spring Cloud Pipelines provides a common deployment pipeline jumpstart for Jenkins or Concourse developers. Join Marcin Grzejszczak from the Spring Team for live demos and coding.
Save My Seat <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/continuous-deployment-to-the-cloud?utm_source=pivotal-digest&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-cloud-deployment_q217]]>
